author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Comperia.pl Aims To Raise At Least 8 Mln Zlotys From Share Issue
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Comperia.pl SA:
* SAID ON THURSDAY THAT IT ESTIMATES THAT IT NEEDS TO RAISE FROM A SHARE ISSUE AT LEAST 8 MILLION ZLOTYS TO FINANCE ITS GOALS IN RESPECT OF OPERATING SEGMENTS AND BUSINESS PROJECTS
* PLANS ADDITIONAL SHARE ISSUE OF G SERIES SHARES, INCLUDING RIGHTS ISSUE
* THE SHAREHOLDERS ARE TO VOTE ON THE SHARE ISSUE ON APRIL 6
* PLANS TO ALLOCATE THE PROCEEDS FROM THE SHARE ISSUE FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF INSURANCE ACTIVITY, AMONG OTHERS
Source text for Eikon:
